epqf-N3JrqNkinSzD4RfFw.text: I recently ordered from them via Uber Eats. I had the bolognaise pasta with spaghetti noodles and an order of garlic bread. The bread is sliced like pizza and was just okay, not quite thick enough the way I like it. The pasta was good but missing the "tub of Parmesan cheese" that it was supposed to come with. I had my taste buds all ready for spaghetti and Parmesan, the absence was noticeable to my pallet but the food was good on its own so I forgave the error. Prices are really good for the area and delivery is around 30 minutes. Give them a try.

UfXasF8PrjdGdNUsaywErg.text: Very quick service, freshly made, nice place, friendly staff, very tasty and filling falafel wrap. I preferred that than pizza or pasta. 1.50 for home delivery. They have been open for more than 6 months now.

uESBSaJnn-MLE6JSQt7maQ.text: Placed an order and took over an hour to get, once it got here the food had mushrooms (which I'm allergic to) after making it very clear they couldn't be in the meal. I called back someone apologized and said they would resend it, wait another hour and call back and "we're a little bit busy, you have to keep waiting or I'll refund your money" wow way to not help the customer out.
